introText: I am {{age}} years old, I live in Terrassa (Barcelona), and I am dedicated to the development of multiplatform applications with Flutter. I am a lover of sports and music; and of the latter, make it sound with the guitar
introText2: This web page has been developed from scratch with said technology.
introtext3: Below you can download my Curriculum Vitae, or browse the different tabs to obtain more detailed information.
